text: In the wake of yesterday's news that the New York Post is being sued over one of its recent cover stories - - that notorious ` ` BAG MEN'' report portraying two innocent men as possible Boston Marathon bombing suspects - - the News Corp. tabloid is out today with another winner : A cover making light of a disturbed man's attempted suicide at Manhattan's Rockefeller Center. The coverline reads : ` ` MORNING GORY : Man tries suicide at'Today'show... and it's not Matt Lauer.'' The report, which I won't link to on principle, begins : A distraught Queens man, ranting about a $ 1. 3 million IRS bill, tried to kill himself outside the Rockefeller Center studios of NBC's '
